title: Animal husbandry
creator_credit: John C. Elder and Gaumont-British Instructional
brief_description: A detailed study of livestock farming in Scotland; locations are indicated by maps; statistical charts are shown; marketing is shown at a tyupical local market; daily work on various farms is shown, including farms specialising in sheep, beef cattle, dairy cattle and pigs.
description: A detailed study of livestock farming in Scotland; locations are indicated by maps; statistical charts are shown; marketing is shown at a tyupical local market; daily work on various farms is shown, including farms specialising in sheep, beef cattle, dairy cattle and pigs.
